Remove 'add compute' button for user who is not allowed to create computational resources
Cost details dialog fixes. Date should be in one line on billing detail popup
[Manage environment]: Action does not submit because of not correct value passing
[Chrome]: After creating edge any actions is not available (except for "Git credentials") until press "f5"
If update the configurations for Spark Standalone the value of Memory per Executor is less than 75% from total
[Azure]: Billing is not available
User is not Admin by default after creating SSN
The same style should be on all DLab pages
Prevent scheduler submit on turning off scheduler. Error handling should not appear if turn off scheduler
UI Issues with EMR configuration
Notebook termination should convey the future status of previously stopped cluster on confirmation dialog
Extra vertical scrollbar for six users on Manage popup"
[Manage roles]: Back-end issues
TensorFlow-Jupyter/Deep Learning creation fails on process of nvidia-installer
Remove header in case of absent computational resources on confirmation dialog

URL should be in one row on Notebook name popup
[AWS]: EMR creation fails

Rendering issues on 'Reporting' page (only in Firefox browser)
It should be disabled to stop edge via 'environment management' if notebook/computational resource is in creating/configuring status
Role UI issues
[Environment management]: Size value is absent for computational resources on confirmation dialog
Page is blocked during uploading a key
Extra scrollbar during tabs switching from left to right on SSN monitor page
It is possible to stop/terminate notebook if related computational resource has terminating status in 'show active' mode on 'resource list' page
Error message for existing image name is absent during creation image on the other Notebbok
[Autotest]: Edge creation fails due to not valid of username or password
[Azure]: Error handling is absent for wrong username/password
[R package]: Library installation has failed but status is still 'installing' on DLab UI
Value of used space is not true on HDD tab
Instance shapes should be filtered by clouds

[Azure]: Sometimes Images/instances creation fails due to one IP is allocated to two instances simultaneously
[Manage roles]: Name group is cropped
Jupyter creation fails on process of installing Toree-Scala kernel
It should be impossible to stop Data Engine during notebook image creating on 'environment management'
[Azure]:SSN creation fails on process of network interface creating
[AWS]: Use private IP address instead of public for notebooks proxy
Extra VPC addes during SSN creation with parameters of one VPC

EMR configuration fails due to of limited quantity nginx restart per 10 seconds
Apache Zeppelin template is absent on DLab UI
Information message should be center aligned on "Manage git credentials" popup

"Apply" button is not active after reopening "Backup options" popup if all backup options were unchecked previously
Creation only the first notebook of every template fails due to AMI_ID does not exist

Spark Standalone creation (custom/default) fails on Zeppelin

Spark Standalone reconfiguration fails if spark name is a part of another spark name on one notebook
Reconfiguration local spark on notebook deletes paths to jars in spark-defaults.conf
[Azure]: Custom parameters are not written in spark-defaults.conf if create custom Spark Standalone (NOT via regonfiguration)
[GCP]: Error message is beyond of "Add computational resources" popup
[Billing Report]: User's value in dropdown list should be in lower case
[Quota]: error message should be in one style

[Quota]: percentages for user quota and total budget are calculated wrong (percentages are less than actually)
[Quota]: After logging warning is absent if overquota (per user and total budget) is 200% and more
[Quota]: After updating quota values the corresponding warning appears or does not appear only after the second the log in
[Billing Report]: 'Creating Image' should be the same style as on the other pages
Deeplearning creation fails on step of installing cntk
[Confirmation dialog]: Prevent cluster header in case of notebook termination and no cluster is available on notebook
[AWS][GCP][Data Engine Service]: RStudio stopping fails on process of removing dataengines kernel

[Scheduler reminder]: Extra space in word
[Manage Environment]: Extra space between user and total budget
[Zeppelin]: Memory should be allocated for spark based on notebook instance shape

The warning updates for user only after second login if admin adjusts the quota

Unable to resolve host localhost.localdomain on notebook

All DLab resources should be tagged as product:DLab
Information for not existing page and not having permission to page access
Admin should be informed about successfully or unsuccessfully backup execution

Add LDAP authorization in Squid
[GCP]: Prevent adjusting total budget/user limit and cluster configurations for Dataproc

Change in build procedure: build UI and BE after SSN is deployed
Prevent Java library installation for RStudio and RStudio with TensorFlow templates
Investigate updating node version js and dependencies
Review documentation concerning DLab deployment on AWS

Verifying action should be for unsuccessful backup execution

Rename columns Swap Page In/Out in SSN Monitor
Write instruction how to update certificates on DLab
DEX support on UI

[AWS][EMR]: Add link to AWS documentation
[AWS]: Add parameter CIDR for the second VPC

Allow port range 4040-4045 for notebooks
Correct setting of executor and driver memory for Zeppelin
[Apache Zeppelin]: Add info concerning change of spark default configuration from DLab UI
API for updating user group
Possibility to execute SS schedulers in cluster mode
